name: Water usage
description: This dataset contains the average water usage and cost

name: Brabant Jobs
description: This dataset contains jobs in Brabant per municipality and sector for 2020. Figures are absolute numbers

name: COVID-19 statistics
description: This datasets contains COVID-19 statistics since February 2020

name: Brabant health information
description: This dataset contains Brabant health information in percentages

name: Brabant municipalities
description: This dataset contains the names of municipalities in Brabant. It can be used to filter nationwide datasets to only show Brabant municipalities.

name: Housing stock information in Brabant
description: This dataset contains data on available housing in Brabant.

name: Land usage Brabant
description: This dataset contains the land usage in municipalities across Brabant. all units are x 10.000m2

name: Landscape management data Brabant
description: This dataset contains national figures for the maintenance and management of the landscape.

name: Student debt data
description: This dataset contains national figures about student debt. No. people is x 1000 person, sum is billion euros, rest is x 1000 euros

name: Tree data
description: This datasets contains characteristics about trees in a similar climate as the Netherlands.

name: Job vacancies in Brabant
description: This dataset contains figures about the amount of job vacancies in Brabant. Fgiures are absolute numbers from 2020 Aug.

name: Weather data Brabant
description: This dataset contain weather conditions for weather stations in Gilze-Rijen and Eindhoven.

name: Youth labour participation
description: This dataset contains figures about youth labor participation in the Netherlands. Units are x 1000 people, or percentage for rates.

name: Renewable energy
description: This dataset shows the electricity produced with different renewable sources between 1990 and 2020. All values are in mln kWh if not stated otherwise. Installations is absolute number

name: Consumer expenses
description: Contains information on consumer expenses between 2000 and 2020. Change in baseline is ratio compared to 2015 values. So 2015 is 100. Delta YoY is the change compared to last years same data

name: Bankruptcies
description: This dataset contains the number of bankruptcies reported in separate regions of the Netherlands for 2009-2020. This could serve as an indication of financial situation.

name: Municipality analysis
description: This dataset contains extensive data on municipalities from 2013 to 2016. Units are either absolute values or percentages.

name: Water treatment plants
description: This dataset contains info about waste water treatment plants in the Netherlands. Data is ranging from 1981 to 2019, but is not measured each year. Flow metrics are in 1000m3, inhabitant equivalent means plant can handle that many inhabitants discharge.

name: Dairy product prices
description: Price of dairy products between 2021 Jan and 2022 May. unit indicated in data set. Source: https://www.agrimatie.nl/Prijzen.aspx?ID=15125

name: Cattle prices
description: Price of cattles and cattle products between 2021 Jan and 2022 May, units indicated in data. Source: https://www.agrimatie.nl/Prijzen.aspx?ID=15125

name: Sheep prices
description: Price of sheep between 2021 Jan and 2022 May, units indicated in data. source: https://www.agrimatie.nl/Prijzen.aspx?ID=15125

name: Poultry prices
description: Price of poultry between 2021 Jan and 2022 May, units indicated in data. source: https://www.agrimatie.nl/Prijzen.aspx?ID=15125

name: Pig prices
description: Price of pigs between 2021 Jan and 2022 May, units indicated in data. source: https://www.agrimatie.nl/Prijzen.aspx?ID=15125

name: Agricultural land use
description: Data on how agricultural land is used in/near Den Bosch. source: https://opendata.cbs.nl/statline/#/CBS/nl/dataset/80781NED/table?fromstatweb

name: Farmers NH3 emission
description: NH3 and other emissions for farmlands with coordinates and indicator whether its close to a Natura 2000 area. data was converted from geoJSON, original source: https://data.overheid.nl/dataset/15524-bestand-veehouderijbedrijven

name: Natura 2000 Netherlands
description: This data set contains information about all Natura 2000 locations in the Netherlands. original source: eea.europa.eu/data-and-maps/data/natura-13

name: Employee age distribution Den Bosch
description: This data set contains the distribution on the working population of den bosch per neighbourhood. The values for the age groups are in percentages.

name: Education per neighbourhood
description: This data set contains percentage of the population belonging to a given education category. All neighbourhoods are in Den Bosch.

name: Education per area
description: This data set contatins percentage of the population belonging to a given education category. All areas are in Den Bosch

name: Average salary DenBosch
description: This data set contains the average salary per neighbourhood and age group in DenBosch. All values are in thousand euros and denote annual salary.
